amendment.description: To exempt any civil action against a person from the provisions of the bill if the gross negligence or reckless conduct of the person proximately caused death or injury.

Amendment SA 2631 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S1864-1865, S1867-1871; text: CR S1864-1865) To exempt any civil action against a person from the provisions of the bill if the gross negligence or reckless conduct of the person proximately caused death or injury.
